long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to retweet something but decided not to just because it seemed no one else had done it? Or maybe you've felt like you just liked a tweet because it had 20K likes already? 

This simple app removes retweet, like and comment counts from the web interface preventing it from influence your opinions. Give it a try and see if you notice a difference in your twitter habits.
